name: Totally Inaccurate Battleship Simulator
description:
AHOY FRESH NEW SAILOR!

It’s time to show those scurvy dogs what we are made of!

Sail to the great briney deep and prepare for battle.

Shoot at the enemy ship with both straight and catapult shots, but beware of the enemy, they have the same tools of yours! Remember to use your wits, sailor! Maybe try to grab a special shot around the map, that will teach those scallywags a lesson!

FEATURES:

  • Reimagination of a Wii classic offered in PvP form
  • 5 different maps that focus on different fighting strategies
  • 3 Special Items that will help a player get the high ground over the other
  • 30+ cosmetic alterations for your ship

DEVELOPED BY:

TEAM X   

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2020/2021)

Programming:

  • Francesco Cimino
  • Matteo Bologna

Game Design:

  • Jair de Almeida Cuomo
  • Lorenzo Fontana

3D Art:

  • Luca Cucciniello 

Concept & 2D Art:

  • Eileen Risso
